# ConfirmationConditions

**Structure**

Conditions for a confirmation request.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ConfirmationConditions
```

## Overview

If any of the conditions are met, confirmation will be requested.

## Type Properties

- **lowConfidenceSource**: Only confirm if initiated from a low-confidence action source.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
